channel.description: The latest CVEs for 99robots -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39989|2024-09-19T20:25:25.134Z -- 99robots -- header%20footer%20code%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 99robots Header Footer Code Manager plugin <=Â 1.1.34 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-3473|2024-08-01T20:12:06.928Z -- 99robots -- header%20footer%20code%20manager%20pro
item.description: The Header Footer Code Manager Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the message parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.16 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-3473|2024-06-04T17:32:43.792Z -- 99robots -- header%20footer%20code%20manager%20pro
item.description: The Header Footer Code Manager Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the message parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.16 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
